name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Adventure Team
description:
Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Adventure Team is an action game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Adventure Team on Wii.
Koichi Nakamura produced the game. It was directed by Hironori Ishigami and Seiichiro Nagahata.
